class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        arr1 = [x + y for x, y in points]
        arr2 = [x - y for x, y in points]
        min_dist = max(
            max(arr1) - min(arr1), 
            max(arr2) - min(arr2)
        )
        indices = [arr1.index(max(arr1)), arr1.index(min(arr1)), arr2.index(max(arr2)), arr2.index(min(arr2))]
        for idx in indices:
            arr1_copy = arr1.copy()
            arr2_copy = arr2.copy()
            del arr1_copy[idx]
            del arr2_copy[idx]
            min_dist = min(
                min_dist,
                max(
                    max(arr1_copy) - min(arr1_copy), 
                    max(arr2_copy) - min(arr2_copy)
                )
            )
            
        return min_dist
